in return for
C Bryant Marshall, SP Cornell Duffy.

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Craig Mahar
Dear Sir,
Craig Mahar has nothing more to prove at AA Cordan Crows!
He has an AVG of .306 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
